Mac Jordan Amartey (1936–2018) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Ghana a ma ama. Ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke rụrụ ọrụ dị ukwuu na ihe nkiri Ghana
N'afọ 2017, o kwuputara na o ji ụkwụ aka mee ihe mgbe e gbupụrụ ya n'ihi ọrịa shuga.
Amartey bụ onye ama ama n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Ghana gụnyere usoro Idikoko TV a ma ama.
